cart.label: Cart
cart.checkout_multiple: or checkout out with multiple addresses
cart.out_of_stock: Sorry, we do not have that many in stock.
cart.error: Sorry, there seems to have been an error. Please try again.

gift_certificates.title: Gift Certificate
gift_certificates.empty_error: You cannot submit with an empty gift certificate
gift_certificates.invalid_error: Please enter a valid gift certificate

gift_wrapping.title: Gift Wrapping
gift_wrapping.choose_how: Please choose how you'd like to have this item gift wrapped.
gift_wrapping.option_same: Wrap each item using the same wrapping options
gift_wrapping.option_different: Use different wrapping options for each item

compare.heading: { num_compare, plural, one {Comparing # product} other {Comparing # products} }

purchase.heading: Purchase A Gift Certificate
purchase.expiry: I understand that Gift Certificates expire after {days, plural, one{# day} other{# days}}
purchase.non_refundable: I agree that Gift Certificates are nonrefundable
purchase.agree_to_terms: You must agree to our gift certificate terms before purchasing.

redeem.heading: Redeem A Gift Certificate
redeem.message: To redeem a gift certificate at {store_name}, follow the simple steps below.
redeem.item1: You need your unique gift certificate code, which is part of the gift certificate that was emailed to you as an attachment. It will look something like Z50-Y6K-COS-402.
redeem.item2: Browse the store and add items to your cart as you normally would.
redeem.item4: Type your gift certificate code in to the 'Redeem Gift Certificate' box and click 'Go'.

balance.heading: Check A Gift Certificate Balance
balance.message: You can check the balance of a gift certificate by typing the code in to the box below.

contact.captcha_desc: Please copy the characters from the image into the text field below. Doing this helps us prevent automated submissions.
contact.question: Comments/Questions
contact.successful: We've received your feedback and will respond shortly if required. Continue.

forms.range: You need to enter numbers only between: {limitFrom} and {limitTo}

add.heading: Add New Address
add.description: Use the form below to change any/all details of your shipping address. Click the 'Save Address' button when you are done.

validation.all_fields: Please fill in all of the fields.
validation.email: Your E-mail address appears to be invalid.
validation.number: You can enter only numbers in this field.
validation.num_max: Please enter a number less than {max}.
validation.num_min: Please enter a number greater than {min}.
validation.num_range: Please enter a number greater than {min} and less than {max}.
validation.different: Fields cannot be the same as each other.
validation.terms_agree: You must agree to these terms before continuing.
validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number (including your area code)
validation.country: The Country field cannot be blank.
validation.state: The State/Province field cannot be blank

product.error_message_stock: Unfortunately, we do not have *quantity* in stock.
product.error_message_general: We were unable to add this product to your cart. Please try again later. Contact us if you continue to have issues.
product.error_message_quantity: We were unable to add this product to your cart. Please try again later. Contact us if you continue to have issues.
product.label: Products
product.success: *product* has been successfully added to your *cart_link*. Feel free to *continue_link* or *checkout_link*.
product.success_alert: *product* has been successfully added to your cart.

errors.general: Please fill in all of the fields.

product_featured.heading: Featured Products
product_featured.no_products: Sorry, there are currently no featured products

product_new.heading: New Products
product_new.no_products: Sorry, there are currently no new products

product_top.heading: Popular Products
product_top.no_products: Sorry, there are currently no popular products to show

search.label: Search
search.no_search: You haven't yet made a search.

results.label: Search results for "{query}"
results.count: { num_products, plural, one {# result} other {# results} } for '{ search_query }'

sidebar_filters.empty_facet: The current list of products does not contain this data.

footer.mailing_list_blurb: We promise to send only good things.

newsletter.subscribed_message: Thanks! We promise to send only good things.
newsletter.unsubscribed_message: You will no longer receive marketing emails from {store_name}

unavailable.hibernation_message: Thanks for visiting. Our store is currently unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
unavailable.maintenance_message: This store is currently unavailable due to maintenance. It should be available again shortly. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

page_403.heading: 403 Error - Forbidden
page_403.message: Sorry, you don't have access to this page. Please click here to continue shopping.

page_404.heading: 404 Error - Page not found
page_404.message: We can't find the page you are looking for. Please click here to continue shopping.

page_500.heading: 500 Error - Internal error
page_500.message: Uh oh, looks like something went wrong. Please click here to continue shopping.

generic.heading: Something went wrong
generic.message: Sorry, something went wrong when attempting to build this page. Please click here to continue shopping.

rss.intro: RSS feeds are used for syndicating regularly changing content on a web site, including this one. You can open an RSS feed using an RSS reader and use it to see if there is any new content on this site or you can set up a server-side script to parse the feed and display it on your web site.
rss.heading: RSS Syndication

blog.heading: Recent Blog Posts
blog.intro: The recent post feed contains the latest {limit} blog posts published on {store}.

new.heading: New Products
new.intro: The latest products feed contains the latest {limit} products added to {store}.

popular.heading: Popular Products
popular.intro: The popular products feed contains the top {limit} most popular products on {store} as rated by users.

featured.heading: Featured Products
featured.intro: The featured products feed contains the latest {limit} featured products on {store}.

search.heading: Product Searches
search.intro1: Product search feeds allow you to save your custom product searches as syndication feed that will always update when there are new results.
search.intro2: To create a product search feed, perform a standard search on {store} and at the bottom of the page click on one of the syndication options.

header.store_credit: You have {store_credit} of store credit. To use it, simply place your order and you will be able to choose store credit as the payment method when it comes time to pay for your order.

contact.question: Comments/Questions
contact.successful: We've received your feedback and will respond shortly if required. Continue.

purchase.heading: Purchase Gift Certificate
purchase.subheading: This gift certificate will be emailed to the recipient after your order has been paid for.
purchase.agree: I understand that Gift Certificates expire after {days, plural, one {1 day} other {# days}}
purchase.agree2: I agree that Gift Certificates are nonrefundable

balance.heading: Check Gift Certificate Balance
balance.subheading: You can check the balance of a gift certificate by typing the code in to the box below.

redeem.heading: Redeem Gift Certificate
redeem.subheading: To redeem a gift certificate at {store_name}, follow the simple steps below.
redeem.item1: You need your unique gift certificate code, which is part of the gift certificate that was emailed to you as an attachment. It will look something like Z50-Y6K-COS-402.
redeem.item2: Browse the store and add items to your cart as you normally would.
redeem.item3: Click the 'View Cart' link to view the contents of your shopping cart.
redeem.item4: Type your gift certificate code in to the 'Redeem Gift Certificate' box and click 'Go'.

common.store_credit: You have {store_credit} of store credit. To use it, simply place your order and you will be able to choose store credit as the payment method when it comes time to pay for your order.

receipt.heading: Order #{number}
receipt.ship_to_multi_text: Order will be shipped to multiple addresses.

return.heading: Return Items from Order #{id}
return.empty: This order contains no products that can be returned. Have you already returned all of the items within this order?

items.description: {num_products, plural, one {1 item} other {# items}} totaling {cost}
items.empty: You haven't placed any orders yet.

addresses.heading: Addresses
addresses.no_addresses: You currently have no addresses added to your profile

recent_items.empty: You haven't viewed any items recently.

messages.heading: Messages
messages.no_messages: You have no messages at this time.
